body_html: Do we want to add it to improve compatibility with CPU scalars? I don't think it's a good idea to support cross-device indexing with non-scalar tensors, since we generally disallow such operations (they are very expensive!).
body_text: Do we want to add it to improve compatibility with CPU scalars? I don't think it's a good idea to support cross-device indexing with non-scalar tensors, since we generally disallow such operations (they are very expensive!).
body: Do we want to add it to improve compatibility with CPU scalars? I don't think it's a good idea to support cross-device indexing with non-scalar tensors, since we generally disallow such operations (they are very expensive!).
